entry_pattern: Asian session range defined. London Open sweeps Asian H/L (Judas Swing), often into HTF POI, with rejection. LTF CHoCH/BoS during London against Judas direction. NY Session entry on retracement to FVG/OB from true London move.
entry_conditions: Decisive London sweep of Asian H/L into valid HTF POI.
Strong rejection (price & volume/tick validated) from POI during London sweep.
Clear CHoCH/BoS on M5/M15 during London, opposing Judas Swing, showing displacement.
NY session entry at a fresh, refined POI (FVG/OB) from the true London impulse.
Volume confirming key stages (sweep rejection, London shift, NY entry attempt).
confluence_conditions_indicators: London Sweep of Asia H/L into HTF POI
NY Entry at FVG/OB from London true move
Killzone timing (London for setup, NY for entry)

risk_model.sl_description: Beyond London Judas Swing extreme or London Shift Origin, + adaptive buffer.
risk_model.tp_description: Targeting opposing session liquidity (e.g., NY H/L) or next HTF levels/ERL.

execution_flow_ispts: Context (ContextAnalyzer.py for session ranges, HTF POIs, Killzones)

scoring.description: Score based on clarity of Asian range, Judas sweep decisiveness, HTF POI reaction, London shift strength, NY POI quality.

fallback_logic.description: If London shift is weak or NY fails to retrace to valid POI/confirm entry, setup for that AMD cycle is invalidated and logged.
